Class WorldGenerator

java.lang.Object
WorldGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Flow.Publisher
public class WorldGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Flow.Publisher
Class responsible for generating world based on given parameters and sending it to the simulators.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  WorldGenerator.Subscription
    Inner class handling communication between world generator and it's subscribers.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    WorldGenerator​(SimulatorConnection[] sims)
    World generator constructor, initializes flags and inner properties, but not the world generating parameters, they have to be specified before starting the generation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void generateWorld()
    Generates the world according to set properties, sends status updates to subscribers.

    Simulators getter.

  • Constructor Details

    • WorldGenerator

      public WorldGenerator​(SimulatorConnection[] sims)
      World generator constructor, initializes flags and inner properties, but not the world generating parameters, they have to be specified before starting the generation.
      Parameters:
      sims - simulators to run the simulation

  • Method Details

    • isSetUp

      public boolean isSetUp()
      Whether or no the world generating parameters have been set.
      Returns:
      boolean - true if generator was set up, false otherwise.

    • getSimulators

      public SimulatorConnection[] getSimulators()
      Simulators getter.
      Returns:
      array of simulators used to run the simulation.

    • getContagionParameters

      public ContagionParameters getContagionParameters()
      Contagion parameters getter.
      Returns:
      contagion parameters that are set in the simulators after world generation.

    • setUpGenerator

      public void setUpGenerator​(Position worldSize, ContagionParameters parameters, int homeCount, int restaurantCount, int schoolCount, int workplaceCount, int population, float initialInfectedRate, float initialCuredRate, float initialVaccinatedRate)
      Sets up generators world generating properties
      Parameters:
      worldSize - size of the generated world
      parameters - contagion parameters to be set initially in the simulators
      homeCount - number of homes in the world
      restaurantCount - number of restaurants in the world
      schoolCount - number of schools in the world
      workplaceCount - number of workplaces in the world
      population - number of people in the world
      initialInfectedRate - chance a person is infected when generated
      initialCuredRate - chance a person is cured when generated
      initialVaccinatedRate - chance a person is vaccinated when generated

    • getWorldSize

      public Position getWorldSize()
      World size getter.
      Returns:
      Position size of the world

    • generateWorld

      public void generateWorld()
      Generates the world according to set properties, sends status updates to subscribers.

    • raisedError

      public boolean raisedError()
      error flag getter
      Returns:
      boolean - true if an error occurred while generating the world, false otherwise.

    • subscribe

      public void subscribe​(java.util.concurrent.Flow.Subscriber subscriber)
      Specified by:
      subscribe in interface java.util.concurrent.Flow.Publisher
